Title: Safe
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Mark Fergus (written for television by), Hawk Ostby (written for television by), Georgia Lee (story editor)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: Unlikely allies Joe Miller and the crew of the Rocinante led by Jim Holden uncover more about the conspiracy to release the proto-molecule on Eros station.
